  • Constructor Details

    • Task

      public Task(GreenSpace greenSpace, String title, String description, TaskUrgency urgency, int taskExpectedDuration, TaskPosition taskPosition, int taskId)
      Constructor for creating a task in the to-do list.
      Parameters:
      greenSpace - the green space associated with the task
      title - the title of the task
      description - the description of the task
      urgency - the urgency level of the task
      taskExpectedDuration - the expected duration of the task in minutes
      taskPosition - the position of the task, must be TaskPosition.ToDoList
      taskId - the ID of the task

    • taskOverlap

      public boolean taskOverlap(Task other)
      Checks if this task overlaps with another task based on their start and end dates.
      Parameters:
      other - The other task to check for overlap.
      Returns:
      True if the tasks overlap, false otherwise.

    • clone

      public Task clone()
      Creates and returns a clone of this task.
      Overrides:
      clone in class Object
      Returns:
      A clone of this task.

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns a string representation of the task, including its title, green space, start date, and status.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      a formatted string containing the task's title, associated green space, start date, and status

    • compareTo

      public int compareTo(Task other)
      Compares this task with the specified task for order based on their start dates.
      Parameters:
      other - the task to be compared
      Returns:
      a negative integer, zero, or a positive integer as this task's start date is before, equal to, or after the specified task's start date

    • cancel

      public void cancel()
      Cancels the task by setting its status to CANCELED. This method changes the task's status to indicate that it has been canceled and is no longer PLANNED or POSTPONED.

    • complete

      public void complete(String observation, Date endDate)
      Completes the task by setting its status to DONE. This method also records an observation and sets the end date of the task.
      Parameters:
      observation - a string containing observations or notes about the task's completion
      endDate - the date and time when the task was completed

    • addTaskAgenda

      public void addTaskAgenda(LocalDate startDate, LocalTime startTime)
      Adds the task to the agenda with the specified start date and time. Sets the task's position to TaskPosition.AGENDA and its status to TaskStatus.PENDING. Also calculates and sets the task's start date and end date based on the provided start date and time.
      Parameters:
      startDate - the date on which the task is to be scheduled
      startTime - the time at which the task is to start

    • equals

      public boolean equals(Object obj)
      Compares this Task object with the specified object for equality. The comparison is based on the task ID of the Task objects.
      Overrides:
      equals in class Object
      Parameters:
      obj - the object to compare with this Task.
      Returns:
      true if the specified object is a Task with the same task ID as this Task, false otherwise.

      public String getObservation()

    • setObservation

      public void setObservation(String observation)
